Class ChainedUserNameMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.hadoop.util.ChainedUserNameMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, UserNameMapper, LifecycleAware

    public class ChainedUserNameMapper
extends Object
implements UserNameMapper, LifecycleAware
    Chained user name mapper. Delegate name conversion to child mappers.
